short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send personalized messages to your clients with our extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The perfect sales tool on WhatsApp: WA SPACE

★ Send personalized messages to your clients
★ Support: images, videos, documents...
★ Random delay between messages
★ Import numbers from a .CSV file
★ Download cvs submission reports
★ Custom fields with variables
★ Custom fields for messages.
★ Messages with emojis
★ Schedule the sending of messages
★ Schedule automatic responses
★ Dashboard with reports for the day, month and year

WA SPACE

★ WA SPACE allows you to send automated, personalized and bulk WhatsApp messages. By doing this, you can have meaningful conversations with your customers and your target audience, thereby growing your business.

★ You will no longer have to send messages one by one to all your clients.

★ No more sending common messages to your featured users.

★ Create personalized responses for your customers with keywords, such as price, location, hours, help, support, sales, features, etc.


LEGAL

This Chrome add-on is not endorsed or certified by WhatsApp Inc and is simply an unofficial enhancement and automation tool that works with WhatsApp for Web.

User privacy is important to us. We do not transmit, sell, share or distribute data collected by users. The extension was designed to take into account the privacy of our users. For more information, read:
